mapper.insert: insert into f_board(id, title, content, write_date) values( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.update: update f_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, id=#{id} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select num ,title, content, id, write_date , viewcnt, (select count(num) from f_board_rep a where a.fnum = b.num ) as re_cnt from f_board b order by num desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: insert into f_board_rep(id, fnum, title, content, rep_date) values( #{id}, #{num}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select count(num) from f_board_rep where fnum=#{num}
mapper.update: update f_board_rep set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, id=#{id} where fnum=#{fnum} and num=#{num}
UPDATE f_board SET VIEWCNT = VIEWCNT + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
